column4: We've found a pretty serious memory leak in gnome-power-manager which we think has been tracked down to Ubuntu-specific code.  How can I get a Ubuntu dev to look at this?  https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gnome-power-manager/+bug/569273
buy professional support, open a case? :)
same here. i'm not ubuntu. not so easy to find the right people
i also got some nice bugs and fixes for them... if only i knew who cares
